channel.title: Ready to start AGAIN
channel.description:
After many failed attempts at running a server im ready to start again.
1)Can I run a server from a wireless laptop 2)I have newest java (help me set up my paths) 3)I have a deltascape source that I wanna use 4)portfowarding 5)nething else I need to know
DONT POST ME A LINK SAYING THAT THERES TONS OF TUTORIALS. IVE PRETTY MUCH TRIED EM ALL.
P.S. btw this laptop is brand new so I shouldnt have ne problems
AND I HAVE WINDOWS VISTA!!!!!!!!NOT XP!

item.title: Ready to start AGAIN
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

There is a Path Setter somewhere, I donâ€™t remember who posted it or which page it is on, but it sets your paths correctly, and works great.

For portforwarding try and do it yourself, or use uTorret.

You should be able to host Via wi-fi, considering people use Ipod touches
But for wi-fi, I suggest connecting to a ROUTER, for maxium Wi-Fi power.
